meta.name: My Lottery Dream Home
meta.description: David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find My Lottery Dream Home.

videos.title: David's Happy Ending
videos.overview: In the one-hour special My Lottery Dream Home: David's Happy Ending, HGTV star David Bromstad will begin a fairytale-inspired renovation on his new home—with plans to update the kitchen and add an extension with a main bedroom, walk-in closet and theater—but he never expects to embark on a four-year long journey. After a massive storm causes the house to flood, David will demo the entire house down to the studs to eradicate mold. When the stress and pressure become too much, he'll make the tough decision to pause the project for a year due to its mental and physical toll. During a healing trip to Norway, David will draw inspiration from the architecture in his ancestral homeland and shift gears away from the fairytale design. Instead, to create his forever dream home, he'll lean into something even more unique that represents this new chapter in his journey.

videos.title: Moms, Best Friends and Helping Hands
David's Happy Ending
videos.overview: In the one-hour special My Lottery Dream Home: David's Happy Ending, HGTV star David Bromstad will begin a fairytale-inspired renovation on his new home—with plans to update the kitchen and add an extension with a main bedroom, walk-in closet and theater—but he never expects to embark on a four-year long journey. videos.title: Moms, Best Friends and Helping Hands
A Big Home for a Big Prize
videos.overview: Rick & Lorie won the Lottery's Mega Millions jackpot of $180 million dollars and are looking for their dream home in Riverside County, California. Host David Bromstad is asked to find a modern, country style home to make Millionaire memories. It should include a large amount of acreage, a big kitchen, 6 or more bedrooms and a place for Lorie's Dad to call home.

videos.title: A Lottery Winner's Dog House
videos.overview: Joe & Rhonda won $11.7 million in the Minnesota Lottery and are looking for a new dream home near beautiful Stillwater. Host David Bromstad travels back to his birth state to help the couple search for a mansion in the range of $2.5 million. He needs to find a treasure with an open floor plan, a big kitchen, up to 40 acres, 4 bedrooms and hopefully a big enough barn for Rhonda's hobby sport of agility training for German Shepherds.

videos.title: Dream Home and Wedding Venue
videos.overview: Design expert, David Bromstad takes New Jersey's newest Lottery winners on a tour to find an amazing new Dream Home. They have a total of $7 million to spend but will they choose $1.65 million 'Old Indian Estate', the historical 'Llewellyn Carriage House', or brand new build 'The Ryserson' in their old neighborhood? Whatever they choose, it's going to be fabulous.

videos.title: Scratch Me Lucky California Dream Home
videos.overview: Family illness and unemployment force this middle-aged couple to move in with their mother. But all that changes when they scratch one million dollars! Follow design expert, David Bromstad as he takes these Californian jackpot winners on a search for their dream home by the waterfront, with room for a boat and a pool.

videos.title: Second Chance Draw
videos.overview: Design expert, David Bromstad takes lucky $5 Million Ohio Lottery winners on a search for the perfect family Dream Home. This young couple need a family friendly neighborhood to raise their son. Will they choose a model home they can build from scratch? An architecturally designed home, on a sprawling 3 acres? Or, a luxurious, move-in ready home in a housing estate?

videos.title: Florida Waterfront Winners
videos.overview: Design expert, David Bromstad takes a Florida real estate agent on a search through Jacksonville to find his million dollar Dream Home. This happy lottery winner pockets a massive $9Million, but is only one home enough for this property expert? Find out if he's tempted to buy one, two or even three of David's suggested properties!

videos.title: Hamptons Dream Home
videos.overview: Design expert, David Bromstad takes $20 Million lottery winners on a search for the ultimate Dream Home in the ultimate location, the Hamptons! This couple has a wish-list a mile long, David has his work cut out for him finding a mother-law-suite, a separate entrance for their grown daughter, and a house with so many bathrooms no-one will ever have to wait, and so many more requests Can David find the perfect property to make everybody happy?

videos.title: Downtown Dream Home
videos.overview: Winning 5 million dollars in a Hoosier Lottery buys more than a Downtown Dream Home, it buys a young woman's independence. Designer David Bromstadt helps Indianapolis local leave her parents' home for the last time, as she buys her very first property. She's looking for a modern bachelorette pad in Downtown Indy - with a little bit of bling! So, will she choose a townhome she can style herself; an ultra modern house on the edge of town, or a city central apartment she can remodel to her own taste?

videos.title: Vacation Dream Home
videos.overview: A busy family that loves the water and won the $1 million lottery wants to buy a house in Gulf Shores, AL. David Bromstadt finds them incredible options: a gorgeous beach house, a lagoon-front home with its own bridge and a condo with water views.

videos.title: Vegas Dream Home
videos.overview: Down and out pro-boxer Damian AKA 'BOLO' hit hard times in Lancaster, California before his dream came true and won $1 Million on a scratcher. He immediately moved his family to Las Vegas, Nevada, and called in design expert David Bromstad to help choose his Dream Home. David shows 'BOLO' some beautiful properties in popular gated communities, but which one will suit him and his family most?

videos.title: Big House Hunting
videos.overview: Tim and Kim won the top prize of $5,500 on an Ohio scratcher, and two years later, won again in the second chance draw... a whopping $2 Million! And just in time, their small 2 bedroom house in Columbus, Ohio is bursting at the seams with a house full of 'stuff'. Now they've asked professional designer, David Bromstad to help them find a supersized Dream Home. It needs to be big enough for them, their mother-in-law, and a lifetime of memories and memorabilia.

videos.title: Texas Dream Home
videos.overview: Monica and Nelly are lucky enough to belong to a family of Lottery winners. Monica's father won a whopping $8 Million in the Texas Lottery and in true Texan style shared the win with the whole family! Monica and Nelly have always longed to live on Possum Kingdom 'PK' Lake, and expert designer, David Bromstad, shows them homes they've only ever dreamed of buying. But now they can afford it, which one or two will they buy?

videos.title: Dreaming on the Chesapeake Bay
videos.overview: A retired couple that loves to spend holidays with family wins $1 million in the North Carolina Powerball and can finally buy the vacation home of their dreams. David Bromstad gets the chance to show them some gorgeous properties along the Virginia coast, all of which would be great for their family, but will they prioritize size over having a great view?

videos.title: California Dreaming
videos.overview: Josh lives in the fast lane when it comes to motorcycles, but after winning $5 million on a scratch-off ticket, he wants nothing more than to slow down on a piece of property in California. He's always dreamed of living on a big piece of land and David Bromstad is there to show him just how much land $5 million can buy. With his new budget and David's help, Josh and his young family will have only the top choices to fulfill all their California dreams.

videos.title: Music City Dream Home for Kansas Lottery Winners
videos.overview: A Kansas couple wins $1 million on a Powerball ticket and now they are finally ready to make the move to their dream city of Nashville, Tennessee. With their recent winnings, the couple is able to afford a dream home big enough to accommodate their five grown children during the holidays. David Bromstad is there to help them find a home that fits.

videos.title: Lucky in Louisville
videos.overview: Lady Luck visited Todd when he bought a lottery ticket on the way home from his daughter's baby shower. He won $700,000 and is now able to provide a beautiful home to help raise his daughter near family and friends in Louisville, Kentucky. Expert designer David Bromstad shows Todd a variety of homes to choose from, making the decision a tough one for this new dad.

videos.title: A Little Piece of Quiet in Indiana
videos.overview: Craig was couch surfing and living paycheck to paycheck when he was given the second chance of a lifetime: a million-dollar prize for winning a Hoosier Lottery second-chance drawing. He can now buy the land he's wanted in the peace and quiet of rural Indiana. David Bromstad shows Craig some beautiful properties that meet his needs, but will he choose a move-in ready, a fixer-upper or a historic home?

videos.title: Utah Mountain Dream Home
videos.overview: Nelly and Pablo were married for just a few months when they won $1 million in the Wyoming Powerball. Now they can afford their dream home in the mountains of Utah, and they're looking for a place that's big enough for their whole extended family. Interior designer David Bromstad joins the couple in their house hunt, along with their teenaged niece, Shania, who has some ideas about what kind of house is suitable for her millionaire relatives. But how far into the mountains are they willing to go?

videos.title: Paradise in Puerto Rico
videos.overview: Ana and Rafael had always planned on retiring from their life in New York City to paradise in Puerto Rico. When Ana won $1 million, they found they were able to take early retirement and buy their dream home sooner rather than later. Host David Bromstad takes the winners on tours of various homes in Puerto Rico to find out if they prefer a modest house close to friends, a modern stunner they can style themselves or an elegant, move-in ready guesthouse.

videos.title: Coast of Dreams
videos.overview: Massachusetts native Linda was unable to afford buying her own home until she won $4 million on a scratch card. Now she can buy her own dream home in her hometown. Host David Bromstad helps Linda decide whether she wants an oceanfront view or a backyard for visiting grandchildren now that she's a millionaire four times over!

videos.title: "Show-Me" State Dream Home
videos.overview: After a $3 million scratcher win, a family of three can finally move from their one-bedroom rental to their dream home in Missouri. They want a big house with a big yard, and David Bromstad shows them some huge properties with all the bells and whistles.

videos.title: Sweet Dream Home Alabama
videos.overview: Kathy and her son, Gene, pooled their money to buy a lottery scratcher while living in California. After winning $1 million, they've decided to return to their Southern roots by moving back to Tallassee, Alabama. They want to live the Southern lifestyle of their dreams -- fishing for Gene and painting for Kathy. Designer David Bromstad shows them some tempting properties, but will this mother and son ever agree?

videos.title: The Good Life in Nebraska
videos.overview: After winning a million dollars on a Missouri Powerball Quick Pick, Carla can finally buy her dream home in Nebraska. But can David Bromstad find it with a dining area large enough to seat over 25 family and friends during the holidays?

videos.title: A Home on the Cape
videos.overview: A mother and her two grown daughters find out how far their $1 million lottery win will take them in Cape Cod, Massachusetts. David Bromstad shows them some beautiful properties with enough space for all three to spread their wings, but which one will tempt them enough to buy?

videos.title: A Family Affair
videos.overview: A husband and wife win a whopping $7 million on a New York Cash for Life Lottery and decide they want to live closest to their eldest son in Buffalo, New York. David Bromstad shows them houses to match their millionaire checkbooks, but how far from their son are they willing to go for the home of their dreams?

videos.title: Brotherly Luck
videos.overview: Two brothers are fortunate to reap the benefits of their parents' $7 million lottery win and search for their very own dream homes. David Bromstad heads to Sarasota, Florida, to show the brothers some gorgeous properties big enough for when the whole family comes to visit.

videos.title: Lake House Lottery
videos.overview: A couple's lakeside retirement dream is now a reality after they scratched up $1 million on a Massachusetts scratch-off ticket. David Bromstad has no trouble finding beautiful properties in Webster, Massachusetts, but can he learn how to pronounce the name of the lake?

videos.title: A Fairytale Fortune
videos.overview: A couple hopes to move from their tiny rental apartment into the home of their dreams near Washington DC after winning a million dollars on a Virginia scratcher. David Bromstad will take them on a tour of various homes near the DC area but the prices are so high they may get priced out of the market. Will this family fairytale have a happy ending?

videos.title: A Mexican Dream
videos.overview: This California couple already has their dream forever home so after winning a million dollars in the lottery, they set out to find their dream vacation home. They've decided to check out their favorite holiday spot in San Felipe, Mexico, but they can't decide if they want to live right on the beach or a few blocks away. David Bromstad is there to help them make this tough decision -- what will they choose?

videos.title: Dreaming Big in Boston
videos.overview: A young Massachusetts couple with six kids was beginning to feel cramped in their water damaged two-bedroom house. After winning a million dollars on a quick pick, however, they're finally able to buy a home big enough for their huge family. David Bromstad is on hand to help them find an incredible property and make their dream home a reality.

videos.title: Mom's Million
videos.overview: After winning a million dollars, a woman gives her son her old condo in Ponte Verde Beach, FL, and seeks a home big enough for her and her hobbies. She has a strong interest in arts and crafts just like designer David Bromstad. Together, they'll find her the perfect hobby home and make her dreams come true.

videos.title: Deano and Carissa: A Scratch Made in Heaven
videos.overview: After winning a state-record $7 million on a single scratch ticket, an Midwest dad hunts for the perfect family home for his partner and kids in their current rural Indiana neighborhood. Designer David Bromstad knows that their huge budget will buy something amazing, but this humble Midwest couple must learn to embrace the moment and think big.

videos.title: Gail and Chet: Boston Dream Garden
videos.overview: After two years of searching, a woman's dream of living in the Boston suburbs is finally within reach after winning $1 million on a Massachusetts scratcher. But can David Bromstad find her dream home and garden before someone else snatches it in Boston's hot property market?

videos.title: Gone with the Win
videos.overview: A woman that won the lottery with 19 of her co-workers has been dreaming of a new life and home with her fiance. Now, they're ready to look for a grand Tennessean mansion and David joins the search only to discover everything really is bigger in the South.

videos.title: A Million-dollar View in Orange County
videos.overview: California empty nesters had their retirement all planned out -- until she picked five winning numbers on the Powerball. Now, they've set their sights on an ocean view that Orange County is famous for and enlist David to find their dream home.

videos.title: The Maine Attraction
videos.overview: A former carpenter and his fiance want to fulfill a lifelong dream of living on the coast of Maine after winning the lottery. They enlist David's help to find their dream home that gives them the perfect slice of coastal life.

videos.title: The Luckiest Cape
videos.overview: A single mother and her 14-year-old son have been dreaming of moving out of their tiny one-bedroom sublet and into a bigger place of their own. Their dreams become a reality after a gigantic $4-million lottery win. Now, with the help of designer David Bromstad, they're exploring beautiful Cape Cod, MA, in search of the perfect dream home.

videos.title: A Family Fortune
videos.overview: After thinking his scratcher had only won him a couple hundred bucks, a man scans his card to find out it was worth three quarters of a million dollars! With his wife and five kids bursting out of their small two-bedroom house, the timing couldn't be better. Now, with the help of designer David Bromstad, this family is going shopping for the home of their dreams.

videos.title: Florida Dreaming
videos.overview: After winning $1 million on a Florida scratcher, a husband and wife realize their dream of owning their own house and land in North Port, Florida. She wants a gourmet kitchen and resort pool and he wants huge backyard to grow fruit trees. David Bromstad heads to North Port to help them find just what they need.

videos.title: Lakehouse Luxury
videos.overview: After renting a holiday cabin at the same lake for 36 years, a couple's $2 million Florida State Lottery win means they can now make it a permanent second home! Traveling to Dale Hollow Lake in Tennessee, David Bromstad unlocks a hidden paradise and helps them find a cherished family lake house.

videos.title: Minnesota Millions
videos.overview: A Minnesota couple brings David Bromstad back to his hometown to help them find their dream home after winning $1 million on a Powerball ticket. In the beautiful family-friendly suburbs, they can now fit all of their children, dogs and cars in luxurious style with plenty of room to grow.

videos.title: Million-Dollar Siblings
videos.overview: A pair of siblings vowed to their late father they would always look out for one another, so when one won the lottery, he didn't hesitate to split it. Together, they now have the chance to re-create cherished family holidays in New Hampshire by buying a cabin in the woods. David Bromstad arrives amongst the stunning autumn colors of Madison, NH, where he helps the new millionaires shop for a dream log cabin.

videos.title: Young and Rich
videos.overview: After a lucky $4 million win, a 27-year-old man keeps his head and plans a brilliant future. His mom watches with pride as he plans to go from tenant to landlord of his very own home. David Bromstad helps them find the perfect project and is delighted to discover the character-filled houses of Westfield, MA.

videos.title: Milk Money
videos.overview: Fran stopped by the grocery store for milk and came home multi-millionaire from a lottery win. Now, she and her partner Sharon are planning to retire and want to find their dream home in Suffield, Connecticut, with enough space to entertain their whole family.

videos.title: Family Fortune
videos.overview: Ever since a Massachusetts mom came home from the grocery with an extra $4 million in her pocket, her husband and her two daughters have been ecstatic to go dream home shopping with David Bromstad. The only problem is whether the two teenage girls can decide on who gets the bigger bedroom!

videos.title: California Chick House
videos.overview: A young-at-heart grandmother wants to buy the perfect "chick house" after a $785,000 PowerBall win. David Bromstad helps her find an adorable home big enough to entertain her huge family but small enough to maintain by herself.

videos.title: Million Dollar Bull's-Eye
videos.overview: After winning a million dollars on a $10 scratcher, a New Hampshire couple can now afford to buy their first family home. David Bromstad shows them a range of beautiful country homes to choose from.

videos.title: Follow Me to Tennessee
videos.overview: A couple wins a million dollars, but instead of buying their own dream home, they want to buy one for their son that they can live in, too. David Bromstad has to find the perfect extended family home in Knoxville, TN, that meets everyone's needs.

videos.title: Canadian Dream
videos.overview: After winning over $1.7 million, Lana and Shannon want to move back to their hometown in British Columbia, Canada. They hope to find a forever home where they can raise their active kids, so David steps in to help them find a stunning property among gorgeous, natural landscapes on Canada's west coast.

videos.title: Papa's Palace
videos.overview: Grandpa Jeff takes his 'Papa' babysitting duties very seriously, so when he won $1 million in Roanoke, Virginia, he knew his dream home had to include a large backyard for his four grandchildren. David Bromstad shows Jeff and his daughter Whitney some great properties with plenty of pasture, but only one will become Papa's Palace.

videos.title: My Big Fat Lottery Property
videos.overview: Wendy has always put the needs of her two sons before her own, but now that she's won $200,000 a year for life on a Florida scratcher, she can finally treat herself to a dream home. She wants to move back to Lake City, Florida, to be closer to her family and desperately wants to live on a big piece of land. David Bromstad helps her find the perfect house and land package.

videos.title: Bliss in the 'Burbs
videos.overview: City boy Calvin is willing to move to the suburbs for his new bride, Denise, but that compromise just got a little easier after a quick pick Illinois lottery ticket won them a whopping $4.75 million. David Bromstad joins their hunt for the perfect forever home just outside of St. Louis.

videos.title: My Lottery Dream Stable
videos.overview: Life is too short to put your passions on hold, so when Jorge, Jackie and their daughter, Jillian, won a staggering $5 million on a Florida scratcher, they could finally buy the horse ranch that they had only dreamed about. David Bromstad meets up with them in Loxahatchee, Florida, to help find the perfect house, land and stables.

videos.title: Little Sister, Big House
videos.overview: When a work colleague wanted to take a chance on some lottery scratchers, Ashley was happy to join in. And it paid off big time! One million dollars later, Ashley can move out of her rental in Cape Girardeau, Missouri, and buy her first home with her share of the winnings. David Bromstad helps her choose between a renovator's dream and a brand-new build.

videos.title: Tallahassee Dream Team
videos.overview: Shane buys scratchers almost every day, and luckily for him and his partner, Crystal, his habit paid off to the tune of $1 million! Now they're able to buy their first house in Tallahassee, Florida. Crystal wants a beautiful home that's move-in ready, and Shane wants a huge yard for their two dogs. David Bromstad is helping them find a property that makes everybody happy.

videos.title: Texas Beach House
videos.overview: After becoming a millionaire on a Vegas slot machine, Rick immediately bought his own dream home. Now David Bromstad joins him in Galveston, Texas, to help him spend his extra cash on a Texas Beach House for the whole family.

videos.title: The Long Island Dream
videos.overview: After winning $3 million on a scratcher, a NYC couple can afford to buy a home back in their old neighborhood of Northport, Long Island. David Bromstad shows them some astounding properties right on Long Island Sound, but in the end they must decide if they want to purchase a waterfront property or get more value for their money away from the coast.

videos.title: Ten Million to One
videos.overview: Demolition man John beat the odds and won $10 million on a Massachusetts scratcher. Now, he's ready to kick off his work boots and retire into flip-flops in Hollywood, FL. David Bromstad shows him properties fit for a millionaire who wants to relax and entertain his friends from Boston.

videos.title: Waterfront Windfall
videos.overview: A couple was approaching a chilly retirement when they won $1 million on a Canadian National Lottery! Now they're ready to pack their bags and move across the country to Nova Scotia, Canada, where David Bromstad will show them gorgeous lake and oceanfront properties.

videos.title: Moving on Up in California
videos.overview: After the rise of Silicon Valley, a couple in nearby San Jose, California, that's never owned a home thought they would rent forever due to soaring property prices. However, he won $1 million on a scratch off and David Bromstad is ready to help them find their dream home.

videos.title: Athol Family Dream Home
videos.overview: A dedicated wife, mother and lottery player with a daily scratch ticket ritual was finally rewarded after seven years of perseverance. Her $1 million win has her family looking for a dream home in Western Massachusetts.

videos.title: Beginner's Luck
videos.overview: A lottery skeptic won $1 million on the first scratch ticket she ever bought. Now, with the help of property ace David Bromstad, she and her husband set out to buy the perfect retirement palace in sunny Florida.

videos.title: Luck of the Irish
videos.overview: Bill and Eric hit the jackpot on the St. Patrick's Day lottery and couldn't believe their good luck. Now, the happy couple and their twins need help finding a larger family home on Chicago's classy North Shore. David Bromstad helps them find their dream home at the end of the rainbow.

videos.title: Champaign Moments
videos.overview: Scott bought a "22" scratch card at a local garage because it was Paige's lucky number. A million dollar win later, the couple is looking to upgrade their family home in Champaign, Illinois. David Bromstad finds them the perfect property, and there's another champagne moment to cap off their good fortune.

videos.title: Four-Million-Dollar Smile
videos.overview: Jesus is a regular lottery player but never won more than a hundred dollars. His luck changed big time when he bought a $20 scratcher that netted him a $4 million win. Now, this car-crazy millionaire needs a new pad to house all his flashy new rides in Kankakee, Illinois.

videos.title: IT Geek to Rich and Chic
videos.overview: A self-confessed computer nerd finally came up with a $1 million win after consistently spending $6 a week on lottery tickets. Now it's up to David Bromstad to help him find the perfect bachelor pad in the historic seaside town of Milford, Connecticut.

videos.title: Old Florida Charm
videos.overview: When a New York couple won $7 million on the lottery, they said goodbye to hard work in the Big Apple and hello to sunny retirement in Vero Beach, Florida. Dream home hunter David Bromstad helps them shop for the perfect property in a corner of the Sunshine State that oozes old Florida charm.

videos.title: Payday in V-A
videos.overview: An attorney and single father of a three-year-old son scored $1 million on the Mega Millions. Now he's ready to move out of his rental and find the perfect father-son forever home in beautiful Richmond, Virginia.

videos.title: A Hero's Reward
videos.overview: After lady luck rewards a retired firefighter for a lifetime of service with a big win, dream home hunter David Bromstad helps him search for the perfect bachelor pad in the Lakeland region of Florida.

videos.title: Cabin Fever
videos.overview: A $5 million lottery win has one lucky New York woman looking for a lakefront vacation cottage where she can relax with her girlfriends. Although she wants to keep it simple, David Bromstad steps in to find some perfect properties in the majestic Adirondacks.

videos.title: A Place on Pamlico Sound
videos.overview: After scratching her way to a million-dollar win, a woman and her husband upsize their retirement plans to include a place on the shores of Pamlico Sound in North Carolina. David Bromstad helps them navigate one of the largest lagoons in the state to find their dream retirement home.

videos.title: Old Charm for Newlyweds
videos.overview: When Laura and John got engaged, they got a surprise early wedding gift in the form of a $1 million win on a scratch card. Now this gorgeous young couple is looking for a home with some old-fashioned charm and space to start a family in Worcester, Massachusetts. As a dream home hunter and lover of all things Americana, David Bromstad is guiding them on their journey to the perfect property in this quaint corner of New England.

videos.title: Mr. Double Lucky
videos.overview: When Michael won $100,000 on a scratcher, he couldn't believe his luck ... until he won $750,000 just five weeks later! With his first win, he helped his daughter's young family buy a house in suburban Charlotte, North Carolina. Now with his second win, Michael now wants to buy a townhouse close by so he can watch his grandson grow. Dream home hunter David Bromstad pitches in to guide Michael through three modern townhouses perfectly designed for his lucky lifestyle.

videos.title: The House Always Wins
videos.overview: A professional poker player with a total winning pot of $4 million is ready to go 'all in' on a huge family home along Philadelphia's Main Line area. He challenges David Bromstad to find him a modern home unique enough for his quirky aesthetic in an area full of huge, traditional estates.

videos.title: Florida Windfall
videos.overview: A Florida couple won the state's biggest scratcher prize, a cool $15 million! David Bromstad steps in to help them decide whether they should buy a luxurious beachfront condo or move into a larger home away from downtown Miami with a pool to entertain family and friends.

videos.title: New Love, New Home
videos.overview: Million-dollar winner Marcie is back and she's in love! Life has changed a lot for her since David Bromstad helped her find the perfect dream home on Cape Cod so she's ready to trade up for a couple's cottage in the South Shore Corridor of Massachusetts.

videos.title: Beach House Perfection
videos.overview: After accidentally picking up a Megaplier instead of his usual weekly lottery ticket, Andy won a whopping $5 million. He's now enlisted David Bromstad to help him find the perfect beach house for all his family to enjoy on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

videos.title: Lucky in Las Vegas
videos.overview: After a man hit it big in Las Vegas on his wife's birthday, a couple is ready to find a quiet spot where they can raise their family away from the bright lights of the Strip. David Bromstad is joining the happy couple and will help them find the perfect family home far from the commotion of the city.

videos.title: The Dream Begins in Vegas
videos.overview: Recent lottery winners are given the opportunity to start a new life together by getting married and buying their dream home in Las Vegas with their $1.6-million winnings. Much to David Bromstad's delight, these homebuyers have an eye for design and are happy to put their stamp on whatever house he helps them find.

videos.title: Lakeside Bonanza
videos.overview: After deciding to pass the time with a scratcher, a man and his family found themselves $10 million richer; they are now looking for their dream home by the lake in Orlando and David is excited to show them an impressive list of homes to choose from.

videos.title: Big Sky Dream Home
videos.overview: Montana residents Daniel and Marcia won $1 million in the state lottery and can now afford to buy a dream home in Big Sky country to accommodate their big family! The only problem is that Daniel wants a ranch on a whopping 200 acres of land, but Marcia would like something more manageable. David Bromstad gets to explore some new territory north of Billings, Montana, to show them properties of varying sizes in the quest to find their Big Sky dream home.

videos.title: Lucky in Lafayette
videos.overview: This Louisiana man was homeless and crashing on his son's couch when he won $2 Million! Now David Bromstad is helping the lucky overnight millionaire find the perfect property in Lafayette where he can party with his family and enjoy his fortunes.

videos.title: Some Like It Hotter
videos.overview: After their retirement got a lot warmer with a $1-million New York Scratcher win, a couple is following their best friends to Punta Gorda, Florida, where they hope to buy into a classy retirement village. Home-state boy David Bromstad is ready to rev up the golf buggy to find the newly minted millionaires their dream home!

videos.title: Reinvention in Las Vegas
videos.overview: After winning big on a scratcher, a California single mom is ready to leave her mobile home, job and old life behind for a new start in Las Vegas! David Bromstad sees her as his Goldilocks and is ready to show her three very different locations -- a condo, a townhouse and a single family home -- to see which one is just right.

videos.title: Fort Worth Fortune
videos.overview: A professional poker player and his family are looking for their ultimate dream home in Fort Worth, Texas. David Bromstad's expertise is needed in order to find a place big enough to fit dad, mom and their three small children.

videos.title: Winning Big in Florida
videos.overview: A man who won big is ready to buy a new home in Cape Coral, Florida, with his wife. They look to David Bromstad for his real estate expertise. David finds potential properties with reasonable price tags and breathtaking scenic waterways.

videos.title: Delaware Dream Home
videos.overview: A Staten Island couple's dream of trading their fast-paced life for quiet, relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, becomes a reality after they win a million dollars. David Bromstad joins them on the Delaware coast to help them find their forever home.

videos.title: Make Me a Millionaire
videos.overview: A couple's big win was the break they desperately needed to move out of their cramped basement rental and give their two children a better life. David Bromstad helps them search the suburbs outside Boston for the perfect family dream home with lots of elbow room and a yard big enough for a swing set and pool.

videos.title: Virginia Beach Forever
videos.overview: After serving in the US Air Force for six years, a couple decides to leave Arizona and find their dream home in the military-friendly town of Virginia Beach, Virginia. With a life-changing $100,000 settlement to be used for a down payment, David Bromstad helps them pick out a house for their young family.

videos.title: Newlywed Millionaires
videos.overview: After these newlyweds bought a lotto ticket at a gas station, they filled up both their gas tank and their bank account! The instant millionaires are now on the hunt for their dream home in Columbus, Ohio, where they can start a family. David Bromstad loves the Midwest so he's eager to explore the fabulous neighborhoods where the happy couple wants to put down roots.

videos.title: The Sound of Freedom
videos.overview: A couple with two kids was looking for a home on Whidbey Island, WA, when he won $200,000 on a scratcher. With the extra money in their budget, David Bromstad helps them find their dream home and decides he might want to find a vacation home for himself.

videos.title: Mass Cash Stash
videos.overview: A couple in Orange, MA, was struggling to make ends meet until she won $4 million on a scratcher and changed their lives forever. David Bromstad helps them find a home with tons of square footage and a huge backyard for their dog.

videos.title: Almost Throwing Away a Million
videos.overview: After her husband saved a scratcher worth $1 million from going in the trash, a woman calls on David Bromstad to help them find a new home in Cleveland, OH. She hopes to find a property with enough space to entertain her entire family during the holidays.

videos.title: League City Limits
videos.overview: A couple's $1 million win is the perfect chance to ditch the small home. They call on David Bromstad to find their dream home in League City, Texas, that has plenty of space for their teenagers to spread out.

videos.title: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner
videos.overview: Patty won a million dollars on a scratch-off and is beside herself with excitement to find the house of her dreams with the help of David Bromstad. Patty and her sister-in-law target the upmarket suburb of Spring Hill, Florida, for their search. David has some fabulous houses up his sleeve and can't wait to explore this part of Florida, which is known as the "Adventure Coast" and is only a short drive from Tampa.

videos.title: The Great American Dream Home
videos.overview: Brenda and Jesse were living in a tiny apartment in Columbus, Ohio, when they won a million-dollar lottery. Now, David Bromstad takes them on an emotional and memorable journey to help them find their American dream home.

videos.title: Finding the Perfect Lake House
videos.overview: A New York couple who won a million dollars on a single $5 scratcher can finally buy the second home on Oneida Lake that they've always dreamed of. They call on David Bromstad to help them find their perfect lakeside dream home, but the only catch is that they have a long wish list and a tight budget.

videos.title: Bangor or Bust
videos.overview: Nick won $100,000 from a scratch off and now he and his wife Robyn want to buy their forever home in Bangor, Pennsylvania. David Bromstad is challenged to find them a single-family home on a very small budget, and to make it even tougher, they want a three-car garage.

videos.title: Follow Your Nose
videos.overview: After winning $1 million on a quick pick Powerball ticket, a woman and her husband call on David Bromstad to help find their forever home. The house must come with a certain smell, however, challenging David to find one that passes her sniff test.

videos.title: A Slice of New Jersey Paradise
videos.overview: A former police officer couple manifested a better life for themselves and their five kids when they won the lottery in Bergen County, NJ. They call on David Bromstad to find a property that fits their large family and meets their sky-high expectations.

videos.title: On the Throne
videos.overview: Billy won a million dollars on a scratch-off and changed his family's life, no longer living paycheck to paycheck. Now they need David Bromstad's help to find a forever home in Knoxville, TN, that fits their $180,000 budget.

videos.title: The Love Nest
videos.overview: Newlyweds in Des Moines, Iowa, want to start a family but their current home is barely big enough for the two of them. After winning big on a scratcher, they hope David Bromstad can find the best, brand-new construction the city has to offer.

videos.title: Buy Now, Inherit Later
videos.overview: A construction worker that won $250,000 calls on David Bromstad to help him find a home close to his eight adult daughters. One daughter joins the house hunt and looks for a place that has projects to keep them busy and space for the grandkids to visit.

videos.title: Sparkle in the Sunshine State
videos.overview: After winning a million dollars, a couple seeks a home in Jupiter, FL, which is renowned for the lifestyle it offers to the rich and famous. Florida's booming population and low stock challenge David Bromstad to find a glamorous home at the right price.

videos.title: Lucky Lakeside
videos.overview: After winning in the powerball, a Connecticut couple wants a summer lake home where they make memories with their kids. David Bromstad hunts for the perfect haven on the lakes of East Haddam and guides the couple through lake house ups and downs.

videos.title: South Shore Score
videos.overview: David Bromstad helps his 14th set of Massachusetts winners find a home on Boston's South Shore. They've been living in a tiny apartment with their giant fur baby, but they hope to find a property with a huge yard where they can start a family.

videos.title: A Mansion for Mom
videos.overview: A man's hard work paid off when he won $7 million after playing the same set of numbers for three years. Instead of buying a home for himself, he hopes David Bromstad can help him find a Texas mansion for his mom where she can enjoy her twilight years.

videos.title: 500,000 Reasons to Party
videos.overview: A Wisconsin mom is ready to ditch her tiny apartment after winning $500,000 on a scratch off. Now that her kids have left the nest, this house hunt is all about her and she asks David Bromstad to find a home with space to entertain friends and family.

videos.title: The Lottery Queen
videos.overview: An avid gambler won $500,000 on the Illinois lottery and is ready to hunt for a townhouse with David Bromstad. She wants a fixer-upper so she can put her own stamp on the home, but David may persuade her to buy a fully renovated property.

videos.title: Mountain High Dreams
videos.overview: A Florida couple receives an inheritance from a long-lost relative that leaves them $900,000 richer. They struggle to agree on a budget for a mountain vacation home in Blue Ridge, GA, so David Bromstad steps in to help them find something they both love.

videos.title: Holiday Extravaganza
videos.overview: David Bromstad and his Christmas helpers surprise his family with a spectacle of everything fun and festive! Using amazing tree designs, novelty garland, baked decorations and blankets of snow, David shares his tips for staging fabulous holiday decor.

videos.title: First-Time Forever Home
videos.overview: David Bromstad heads to Dallas, Texas, to meet a couple who won the lottery in life and love! David has to be on his A-game because between this pair's construction and inspection experience, they really know what to look for in their forever dream home.

videos.title: A Spacious Win
videos.overview: A single mom won $3 million on the lottery and wants more space after sharing an apartment with her three growing girls. With four ladies to please, David Bromstad has his hands full finding a home with rooms for everyone and space to spread out.

videos.title: G'ma's Pad
videos.overview: With 37 piercings, 89 tattoos and endless wigs, David Bromstad has never met a winner like this grandma! She wants a big house so her elderly mother can move in with a yard to fill with grandkids, and David has a $200,000 budget to find her perfect home.

videos.title: Vacation Time at the Cape
videos.overview: A Massachusetts couple has been vacationing with their family in Cape Cod for over 30 years, and thanks to a scratch-off jackpot, they're buying a dream home there! David must work fast to help them snatch up their perfect place in this hot market.

videos.title: King and Queen of M'Orlando
videos.overview: David gets to stay at home as he helps lucky newlyweds find their dream home in Orlando, Florida. After winning a million dollars on their anniversary, this couple wants for a two-story house where they can feel like royalty overlooking the neighborhood.

videos.title: Gone Fishin' for a Dream Home
videos.overview: After a $250,000 scratch-off win, a couple of empty nesters are finally moving back to her native Mandeville, Louisiana. While they need a fabulous in-law suite and plenty of space for visitors, David also has to find a home with a fishing hole nearby.

videos.title: So Young, So Rich
videos.overview: In North Carolina, David helps his youngest winner yet put her $390,000 towards buying a home to share with her mom and sister. There aren't many 22-year-olds with a property portfolio, so David is thrilled to find a home with pretty livestreaming spaces.

videos.title: Million-Dollar Wonderland
videos.overview: After winning big on a scratch-off, a couple is all smiles as they hunt for their dream home near Canton, Ohio. David braves the cold to help them find the perfect compromise between city and country living in a snow-covered winter wonderland adventure.

videos.title: Border Town Bonanza
videos.overview: David meets his newest winners in the semi-rural countryside on the border between New York and Canada. Despite the winter chill, they're looking forward to the summers as they search for a home with country charm and a pool.

videos.title: Million-Dollar Baby
videos.overview: Thanks to a million-dollar win on a scratch-off, a couple and their baby can finally move out of their one-bedroom apartment. David is happy to help this family find a bigger home near Binghamton, New York, even if he does struggle with the city's name.

videos.title: Six Million Reasons to Smile
videos.overview: The Florida lottery gave a couple of government employees a fabulous early retirement gift of six-million dollars! With their teens in tow, David shows the whole family how to revel in luxury as they embark on a spree full of sun, sand and lavish homes.

videos.title: From Portland to Paradise
videos.overview: A Portland man was homeless when he inherited $1.4 million after his mother passed away. Now, he and his partner are moving to warm Cape Coral, Florida, and David is ready to find them a house where they can fish, boat and soak up the sunshine in style!

videos.title: A Million-Dollar Hug
videos.overview: After tragically losing a husband and father, a mother and her two daughters are given a million dollars of comfort thanks to a scratch ticket. Ready to find their dream home in Leechburg, Pennsylvania, David leads the way one silly walk after another.

videos.title: Mortgage Free in Atlanta
videos.overview: After winning $1 million, a San Francisco family decides they want to live mortgage free and buy a huge home in Atlanta. They're looking for a place with a few projects and a big yard, and David shows them just how far their money can go in the suburbs.

videos.title: To Son, with Love
videos.overview: A devoted grandma won $1 million on a quick pick, and now she wants her youngest son and his family to find their own home in Bridgeport, Connecticut. Only an hour out from NYC, David starts searching for some surprising fixer uppers to stay on budget.

videos.title: Seven Million Big Ones
videos.overview: Two New York EMTs have dedicated their lives to helping others, but with a lotto win under their belts, it's their turn for some self care! David helps them find a Florida dream home in Cape Coral where the warm waters aren't far from their front door.

videos.title: Cashed Up in Cartersville
videos.overview: After winning $2,000,000 on a scratcher, a Florida couple is moving the whole family to just outside of Atlanta. David's shocked at how much house they can buy close to a major city as this family decides between a five-acre yard and a six-bedroom home.

videos.title: California Dreams
videos.overview: After a five-million-dollar scratch-off win, a family of five can finally move out of the two bedroom apartment they share with three dogs. David helps them navigate the expensive and exclusive California market for a home that has a room for everyone!

videos.title: Oh, My Goodness!
videos.overview: After winning $5 million on a scratch ticket, two empty nesters are gifting their children with their dream forever home. David takes this generous couple on an adventure through New York's Hudson Valley where they are wowed by every property they see.

videos.title: Rags to Riches
videos.overview: Thanks to a million-dollar scratch-off, a couple that was living paycheck to paycheck can finally move out of their one-bedroom apartment! David tours his neighborhood of Winter Park, Florida, as they search for a home with their very own lawn to mow.

videos.title: Massachusetts Millions
videos.overview: Two Bostonians couldn't have wished for a better start on the property ladder than a share in a million-dollar lotto win. With David as their guide, they tour gorgeous century-old houses full of history and possibly ghosts in Salem, Massachusetts.

videos.title: For Lovers and Lottery Winners
videos.overview: A couple use their $100,000 winnings to put a down payment on their first family home in Virginia; David narrows down the options with a house that has separate rooms for the kids and a backyard for family time.

videos.title: A Fistful of Friendship
videos.overview: A Bingo player who won a $60,000 progressive jackpot is making a down payment on a home closer to her BFF in Phoenix. David Bromstad joins these lifelong pals as they search for a home with a spare room for sleepovers and plenty of space for entertaining.

videos.title: Millionaire Mama
videos.overview: After raising three girls in a small Miami apartment, a single mom is looking forward to spending her million-dollar win on the home of her dreams. She's hoping for a standalone home, but David knows some gorgeous townhouses that may just change her mind.

videos.title: Heartfelt Inspiration
videos.overview: Three years after facing unbelievable tragedy, a couple is picking up the pieces and moving to a dream home in Burleson, Texas. David is eager to help them find the perfect place so that this inspiring couple can start the area's first female-run brewery.

videos.title: Philly to Fayetteville
videos.overview: A $2 million win came at the perfect time for a couple who relocated from Philadelphia to take care of their family in Fayetteville, North Carolina. Now, David helps them track down the right home for hosting weekend barbecues with their 10 grandkids.

videos.title: Million Dollar Angel
videos.overview: When a selfless Massachusetts woman and family caretaker wins $2 million, it means a brighter future for the whole household! David takes her on an adventure through Plymouth as they encounter cranberry bogs, historic homes and the odd farmyard animal.

videos.title: Second Chance Lottery
videos.overview: After a close call with a motorcycle accident, a New York couple credits My Lottery Dream Home marathons as their motivation to get through rehabilitation. Now, David is happy to help them find their own dream home in sunny St. Augustine, Florida.

videos.title: Quick Cash in Cedar Rapids
videos.overview: A family of six was saving for a down payment on their first home when they won $100,000 on a scratcher. With the boost to their budget, David takes them on a tour of family-friendly areas in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, that are close to schools and golf courses.

videos.title: Knock Knock, It's a Million Dollars!
videos.overview: After 30 years, a couple got a knock on their door that came with a giant check for $1,000,000! Now, they're moving to Columbia, South Carolina, and they need David's help finding a dream home big enough to host their massive family for the holidays.

videos.title: Blended Bliss in New Hampshire
videos.overview: Busy raising her three kids in Burlington, Massachusetts, a woman is ready for a change of pace after a $2,000,000 lottery win! She's ready to move in with her fiance, so David shows them some adorable family homes just across the border in New Hampshire.

videos.title: Tri-State Scratch King
videos.overview: The self confessed "Scratch King" of the Midwest has won a total of $600,000 on two different scratchers. Now, David helps this contractor and single dad find a move-in ready home he can enjoy with his five-year-old son in the Sioux Falls tri-state area.

videos.title: Must Love Goats
videos.overview: Through difficult circumstances, a single man gets an unexpected windfall and now he's ready to find his dream home. David searches California's Central Valley to find a peaceful place where he can host guests, settle down and maybe start his own family.

videos.title: Bangor Bucks
videos.overview: A mother wins big on a scratcher, but since she already has her dream home, she has decided to help her daughter find hers. The duo enlists David to get her growing family out of a cramped apartment and into a house with more space in Bangor, Maine.

videos.title: South Beach Birth Rite
videos.overview: When a Miami, Florida, native received an inheritance, she knew it was time to find a vacation condo in South Beach! It's where she and her best friend grew up and made great memories, so now she needs David's help to find a place to rest and reminisce.

videos.title: Wonderland in Maine
videos.overview: A Massachusetts couple finds hope and happiness with an inheritance and looks to relocate. Now, David helps them begin a new chapter by searching for homes in the picturesque town of Bath, Maine, including a sprawling eight-bedroom mansion!

videos.title: The Akron Bunch
videos.overview: A couple scratched up a sweet $150,000 win, and now they're ready to blend their two big families together. With seven kids between them, including two sets of twins, David is tasked with finding a family home large enough for nine in Akron, Ohio.

videos.title: Million Dollar Mom
videos.overview: A million dollar scratcher win in Florida gave a California native all the riches she could imagine. Now, David is enlisted to find a home for her daughter's family so they can finally make the cross-country move and be together once again.

videos.title: New Money, New York City!
videos.overview: After winning $1000 dollars a day for life, a Texas native bought his family a dream home in Houston. Now, he's calling on David to search exclusive New York City real estate to find a luxurious Manhattan apartment fit for a lottery winner.

videos.title: Ain't Nothin' But a Corn Dog
videos.overview: A Bosnian couple has been living the American dream for over 20 years, and their luck continues after scratching up a $100,000 win! Now, David helps the couple upgrade and search for a larger home for his mother and their teenage sons in Grimes, Iowa.

videos.title: Second Chances All Around, in Bangor
videos.overview: After a second chance drawing, a couple wins a whopping $250,000 on an original losing ticket! Now, David is challenged to find a spacious home fit for their growing family, including a garage large enough for his racecars, in Bangor, Maine.

videos.title: Lisa's Little Luxuries
videos.overview: After a lifetime of apartment living, a family can finally buy their first home after a $4 million win! David is tasked with finding a home with a backyard, a laundry room that doesn't require coins, and other little luxuries in Nashua, New Hampshire.

videos.title: Winter Wonderland
videos.overview: A couple scores a $1 million jackpot on a $30 scratcher, and now they're ready to find a vacation home for wilderness fun! Winter sports are their favorite hobbies, and now David is tasked to find a mountain getaway on Moosehead Lake in Greenville, Maine.

videos.title: Carolina Beach Legacy House
videos.overview: A couple decides to invest an inheritance in a beach house that can be a legacy home for the entire family. They want something that's quirky, and they need David's help to search for just the right place in Carolina Beach, North Carolina.

videos.title: First-Time Homeowners, First-Time Millionaires!
videos.overview: A young couple wins big and are ready to start building a life together and find a first home they can renovate; David arrives with plenty of ideas and helps explore options in the picturesque town of Rochester, N.Y.

videos.title: My Big Island Dream Home
videos.overview: After receiving an inheritance, a couple looks to leave Oklahoma and find their dream home in Hawaii; they're searching for a place big enough to host family for holidays, and David makes a trip to the Big Island to help them find the perfect place.

videos.title: A Snowbirder's Florida Haven
videos.overview: Thanks to a family inheritance, a Midwestern couple are ready for the relaxing vibes of central Florida; they're bringing in David to help search for their forever home, and now it's a decision between a golf course view and a relaxing rural outlook.

videos.title: Lake Cumberland Dreaming
videos.overview: Thanks to a $5 million scratcher win, a couple is ready move from city life in Cincinnati to lake life in Lake Cumberland, Ky.; they're looking to move back where he spent his summers as a kid.

videos.title: Texas Tranquility
videos.overview: After an unexpected inheritance, a woman is finally able to buy a home near her daughter and grandchildren; She wants a house that's no more than ten minutes away from her family.

videos.title: Luck Comes In Pairs
videos.overview: A couple were thrilled when their son struck it big and won $100,000, and a year later, they won a whopping $2 million themselves! Now, they're calling on David to help find a forever home where their lucky family can relax in Richmond, Virginia.

videos.title: Anything You Want in Vermont
videos.overview: After receiving a family inheritance, ex-Long Island residents now see an opportunity to buy a property in their much loved Vermont. David steps in and finds character-filled homes full of variety and charm in the breathtaking mountain landscape.

videos.title: The Wizard of Cape Coral
videos.overview: David's back in Cape Coral, Florida, to find his newest winners a coastal dream home. But since his last visit, Hurricane Ian left a path of destruction and limited housing. Now, with some courage, heart, and a lot of smarts, David makes dreams come true!

videos.title: Pennies From Heaven
videos.overview: After a terrible tragedy, a couple feels as if the universe stepped in to deliver a gift in the form of a $10 million scratch off. Now, David is honored to help them search beautiful properties in the military town of Jacksonville, North Carolina.

videos.title: Big Kona Energy
videos.overview: A couple were married in Hawaii 18 years ago, and after winning $5 million on a scratcher, they're moving to the Big Island. With a huge budget, David searches for incredible properties with ocean views, and takes in the Big Kona energy along the way.

videos.title: Myrtle Beach Moves
videos.overview: When a Pennsylvanian woman received an inheritance, it gave her the opportunity to move to the warm shores of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Now, David helps her and her bestie navigate beach real estate to find her forever home.

videos.title: Rubber City Band Aid
videos.overview: A couple living in her grandmother's tiny two bedroom house has never had the means to buy their own home, until they won $1 million on a scratcher. Now, David searches Akron for a home with a big backyard and enough space to host band practice.

videos.title: Living Large in Lubbock
videos.overview: Thanks to an inheritance, a longtime Georgia resident has the chance to buy a large family home closer to her grown-up children in Lubbock, Texas. David shows her some beautiful, spacious places where the houses are big but the prices are small.

videos.title: Friendly Kenly
videos.overview: A couple battling an illness was in a terrible place financially and physically, so when they scratched a million dollars, they knew it was the answer to their prayers. Now, David steps in to help find the perfect place for them to recuperate.

videos.title: Memphis Family Ties
videos.overview: First cousins and BFFs grew up like sisters, so when one gets the chance to buy a family home, the other gets a room of her own...and a bathtub! It's David's first trip to Memphis, and he's searching for the grand, sprawling house of their dreams.

videos.title: Bustle to the 'Burbs
videos.overview: A mom used her son's birth date as inspiration to buy a scratch off ticket, and it won her a million bucks! She's ready to get out of the city and into the suburbs, but with low inventory, David will need his own good luck charm to find her dream home.

videos.title: Nova Scotia Homecoming Queen
videos.overview: With a lottery win in her pocket and a baby just around the corner, a woman is ready to move back home to Shelburne, Nova Scotia, Canada. Affordable oceanfront properties are on David's list, and he's on call to help her find the cutest dream home ever!

videos.title: Second Home Sanctuary
videos.overview: A couple decides to sell their inherited farmland in Iowa and buy a cabin in Minnesota for family and friends to gather and celebrate holidays. And for David, it's a chance to return to his childhood home to help them find the perfect lakeside property!

videos.title: I'm Italian, I Cook Sauce!
videos.overview: A couple caring for elderly parents couldn't afford a home for themselves until fate stepped in and he won a million dollars on a scratcher. Now, David searches for a well-appointed condo with a huge kitchen so she can cook her famous Italian Bolognese!

videos.title: City Mouse vs. Country Mouse
videos.overview: A couple with a $2 million budget is ready to find their dream home, but she's a city mouse and her husband prefers the country. Unable to reach a decision, they've asked David for help finding a house with a lot of space for him, and some bling for her.

videos.title: Million Dollar Start
videos.overview: A North Carolina local received the best present ever by winning a million dollars just before his 27th birthday. Now, David steps in to help him discover some beautiful homes south of Raleigh, along with great shopping and design tips to help him decide.

videos.title: PS, I Love You
videos.overview: As the beneficiaries of their brother's estate, a pair of siblings want to pay tribute to their desert-loving brother and buy a dream home in Palm Springs, California. David is tasked to find the perfect place, and it needs to include a mountain view.

videos.title: St. Paul Homecoming
videos.overview: When a Minnesota born woman won $200,000, she knew that she wanted to go back home! Her and her sister are pooling their money to buy a forever home in St. Paul, and David couldn't be happier to help in the search while checking in with his own family.

videos.title: Tappahannock Is for Lovers
videos.overview: David helps a couple find their dream home in Tappahannock, Virginia.

videos.title: Gold Lady of Lake Mendota
videos.overview: David helps a Wisconsin woman find the ultimate lakefront mega-mansion!

videos.title: Family Bonds
videos.overview: David helps a sibling with an inheritance find a Coachella Valley home.

videos.title: Below Dock
videos.overview: David helps a woman honor her late parents with an Emerald Coast home.

videos.title: Rolling In It on the Texas Plains
videos.overview: David helps a stargazing couple find their dream home in Lubbock, Texas.

videos.title: Small Town, Big Dreams
videos.overview: David helps a couple find a home outside their tiny town of Wilmot, Ohio.

videos.title: Cashed Up in Richmond
videos.overview: David helps a couple find a big and flashy family home in Richmond, VA.

videos.title: The Gold Lady of Naples
videos.overview: David helps a woman find her dream vacation home in Naples, Florida.

videos.title: Low Country Comfort
videos.overview: David helps Connecticut teachers find a forever home in South Carolina.

videos.title: Pensacola Peanuts
videos.overview: David helps do-gooders find a dream home in Pensacola, Florida.

videos.title: Happy Dance in Tennessee
videos.overview: David helps previous winners find a second dream home near Nashville!

videos.title: Pine Island Prince and Princess
videos.overview: David helps a couple find a family vacation spot on Pine Island, Florida.

videos.title: Hot Springs Party Palace
videos.overview: David helps a mother and son find a party palace in Hot Springs, Arkansas.

videos.title: Lottery Strikes Twice
videos.overview: In the season premiere David will meet a Boston couple who first struck it big with a one million dollar win in 2006, and then 17 years later lightning struck again when they scored a whopping 25-million-dollar payday from a 50-dollar scratcher. Now, with a plan to purchase homes for each of their adult children, David will help the pair search for a family hub in Atlanta, Georgia.

videos.title: Peace at Fort Pierce
videos.overview: After relying on the help of friends and family, a woman's needs a suitable place for her disabled husband, and David's ready to find their dream home in Fort Pierce, Florida.

videos.title: Brotherly Love
videos.overview: With his wife's blessing and assistance, a Colorado man looks to buy a house for his big sister and her two children after winning a share of $1 million! Now.

videos.title: Double Dip
videos.overview: Lottery winners have outgrown their California dream home.

videos.title: Sarasota Scratcher
videos.overview: After scratching off a $100,000 jackpot, a Sarasota woman is finally ready to find a place of her own.

videos.title: The Second Time Around
videos.overview: When a Long Island couple relocated to North Carolina, life took an unexpected turn.

videos.title: Golden State of Mind
videos.overview: After selling their Georgia vacation home, a couple's ready to level up with a luxe new summer home in San Diego.

videos.title: David's Happy Ending
videos.overview: In the one-hour special My Lottery Dream Home: David's Happy Ending, HGTV star David Bromstad will begin a fairytale-inspired renovation on his new home—with plans to update the kitchen and add an extension with a main bedroom, walk-in closet and theater—but he never expects to embark on a four-year long journey. After a massive storm causes the house to flood, David will demo the entire house down to the studs to eradicate mold. When the stress and pressure become too much, he'll make the tough decision to pause the project for a year due to its mental and physical toll. During a healing trip to Norway, David will draw inspiration from the architecture in his ancestral homeland and shift gears away from the fairytale design. Instead, to create his forever dream home, he'll lean into something even more unique that represents this new chapter in his journey.

videos.title: Moms, Best Friends and Helping Hands
